description: Swarm A vector (VFM) and scalar (ASM) magnetic field measurements interpolated at 1Hz rate.
terms: This dataset is provided by the European Space Agency and it is subject to terms condition described in https://vires.services/data_terms.

vires:parameters.name: dF_Sun
vires:parameters.description: Magnetic stray field correction intensity of Sun ASM frame

vires:parameters.name: dF_AOCS
vires:parameters.description: Magnetic stray field correction intensity of AOCS magneto-torquer coils

vires:parameters.name: dF_other
vires:parameters.description: Magnetic stray field correction intensity of all other sources

vires:parameters.name: F_error
vires:parameters.description: Error estimate on magnetic field intensity

vires:parameters.name: dB_Sun
vires:parameters.description: Magnetic stray field correction vector of Sun induced perturbation, VFM frame

vires:parameters.name: dB_AOCS
vires:parameters.description: Magnetic stray field correction vector of AOCS magneto-torquer coils, VFM frame

vires:parameters.name: dB_other
vires:parameters.description: Magnetic stray field correction vector of all other sources, VFM frame

vires:parameters.name: B_error
vires:parameters.description: Error estimates on magnetic field, VFM frame

vires:parameters.name: Flags_F

flags: Set when ASM is running in vector mode.
Set for outlier detected, gap, or not enough ASM frequency calibration data for filtering.
Set when at least one of 4 nearest ASM samples is suspicious.
Set for loss of magnetic field lock or telemetry within 8 seconds after ASM restart.
Set for discrepancy between ASM and VFM measurements – at least one of the 4 nearest ASM samples differ from VFM measurements.
Set for gap in 4 nearest ASM samples.
Set for VFM instrument turned off (no stray field corrections).
Set for not enough ASM samples to generate F.

vires:parameters.description: Flags characterizing the magnetic field intensity measurement (F)

vires:parameters.name: Flags_B

flags: Set when ASM instrument is turned off.
Set for outlier detected, gap, or not enough VFM temperature data for filtering.
Set for more than 5 suspiciuos VFM samples in 2 seconds surrounding record time.
Set for discrepancy between ASM and VFM measurements.
Set for in VFM samples in surrounding 2 seconds.
Set for not enough VFM samples to generate B_VFM and B_NEC.

vires:parameters.description: Flags characterizing the magnetic field measurement

vires:parameters.name: Flags_Platform
vires:parameters.description: Flags characterizing the S/C platform information

vires:parameters.name: F_res_Model
vires:parameters.description: Magnetic field intensity, CHAOS magnetic model residual

vires:parameters.name: B_NEC_res_Model
vires:parameters.description: Magnetic field vector, NEC frame, CHAOS magnetic model residual
